title: Screen Freeze after loading scene
body:
There is no problem of my internet, and there is no big problem of each game, the problem only exist after the loading scene and before timeline start to count. My screen will freeze at that moment, I can see health/mana bar but cant see the model of champ, I can see a full ping bar at top and move my mouse, but my screen just freezed while other players experience a normal start of game (I checked it when I duo with my friend).

I have tried reinstall and even scanning but the problem still exist. Now all I can do is ctrl+Alt+Del to call out the manager screen, end every program ran by leage of legends and restart the game (the problem will not exist during the whole game until I start another new game).

btw, it seems the problem only exist in new Summoner's Rift map so I guess the problem may related with the "champion pop up animation" at the beginning of the game.

replies.body: By any chance does this only happen when you play Yasuo?
